alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Giles; Marshall; Maury (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 9:22PM CDT until March 30 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marshall County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Maury County in Middle Tennessee... Central Giles County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Bedford County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 922 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Pulaski, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lewisburg, Pulaski, Spring Hill, Chapel Hill, Cornersville, Lynnville, Culleoka, I-65 East Of Columbia, Rover, Belfast, Frankewing, Farmington and Unionville. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 11 and 52. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
